data:
# NOTE: Metrics representing a superset of other metrics must be declared first if they appear in the same group (displayRows).
# Otherwise different metrics will dominate in the group row depending on zoom level if overlay display mode is used.
version: 2
metricSets:
- name: General Metrics for NVIDIA TU10x (any frequency)
  alias: tu10x
  supportedChips: [TU102, TU104, TU106]
  counterWidth: wide
  displayRows:
  - name: <Root>
    description: GPU Metrics
    displayHeightScale: 0.5
    metrics:
    - GR Active
    type: overlay
  - name: <Root>
    displayHeightScale: -0.5
    metrics:
    - NVLink RX Responses User Data
    - NVLink TX Responses User Data
    - PCIe RX Throughput
    - PCIe TX Throughput
    type: overlay
  - name: GPC Clock Frequency
    description: GPC Clock Frequency
    metrics:
    - GPC Clock Frequency
    type: overlay
  - name: SYS Clock Frequency
    description: SYS Clock Frequency
    metrics:
    - SYS Clock Frequency
    type: overlay
  - name: GPU Active
    description: The graphics or compute engine is active
    metrics:
    - GR Active
    type: overlay
  - name: Compute In Flight
    description: Compute dispatches sent to the DIRECT or ASYNC_COMPUTE Queues that have been issued, but not yet complete.
    metrics:
    - Sync Compute In Flight
    - Async Compute In Flight
    type: overlay
  - name: Draw/Dispatch Start
    description: Draw and dispatch start times
    metrics:
    - Draw Started
    - Dispatch Started
    type: overlay
  - name: SM Active
    description: SM Active
    metrics:
    - SM Active
    type: overlay
  - name: SM Instructions
    description: SM Instructions
    metrics:
    - SM Issue
    - Tensor Active / FP16 Active
    type: overlay
  - name: SM Warp Occupancy
    description: SM Warp Occupancy
    displayHeightScale: 3.0
    metrics:
    - Vertex/Tess/Geometry Warps In Flight
    - Pixel Warps In Flight
    - Compute Warps In Flight
    - Unallocated Warps in Active SMs
    type: stacked
  - name: DRAM Bandwidth
    description: DRAM Bandwidth
    displayHeightScale: 1.0
    metrics:
    - DRAM Read Throughput
    - DRAM Write Throughput
    type: stacked
  - name: NVLink RX Bandwidth
    description: NVLink RX Bandwidth
    type: stacked
    metrics:
    - NVLink RX Requests Protocol Data
    - NVLink RX Requests User Data
    - NVLink RX Responses Protocol Data
    - NVLink RX Responses User Data
  - name: NVLink TX Bandwidth
    description: NVLink TX Bandwidth
    type: stacked
    metrics:
    - NVLink TX Requests Protocol Data
    - NVLink TX Requests User Data
    - NVLink TX Responses Protocol Data
    - NVLink TX Responses User Data
  - name: PCIe Bandwidth
    description: PCIe Bandwidth
    metrics:
    - PCIe RX Throughput
    - PCIe TX Throughput
    type: overlay
  - name: PCIe Read Requests to BAR1
    metrics:
    - PCIe Read Requests to BAR1
    type: overlay
  - name: PCIe Write Requests to BAR1
    metrics:
    - PCIe Write Requests to BAR1
    type: overlay
  metrics:
  - name: GPC Clock Frequency
    description: The frequency of the GPC graphics clock. In NVIDIA GPU Specs this is the Boost Clock and Base Clock. In nvidia-smi this is the "gr", "graphics", "Graphics Clock".
    color: '#8BDDB4'
    id: gpc__cycles_elapsed.avg.per_second
    category: clock
    storageType: uint32
  - name: SYS Clock Frequency
    description: The frequency of the SYS clock. The SYS clock is the clock used for the copy engines, compute and graphics command processor, and the hardware performance monitor streaming unit.
    color: '#118E44'
    id: sys__cycles_elapsed.avg.per_second
    category: clock
    storageType: uint32
    rule: migOptional
  - name: Draw Started
    description: Number of draw calls started.
    color: '#8BDDB4'
    id: FE_A.TriageA.fe__draw_count.sum
    category: draw/dispatch start
    storageType: uint32
  - name: Dispatch Started
    description: Number of compute dispatches/grid launches started.
    color: '#98C4DD'
    id: HUB.TriageA.gr__dispatch_count.sum
    category: draw/dispatch start
    storageType: uint32
  - name: GR Active
    description: Number of cycles the graphics/compute engine is active. The graphics and compute engine are active if there is any work in the graphics pipe or if the compute pipe is processing a dispatch.
    color: '#ED6A32'
    id: gr__cycles_active.avg.pct_of_peak_sustained_elapsed
    category: engine activity
    storageType: uint8
  - name: Sync Compute In Flight
    description: Sync Compute In Flight
    color: '#98C4DD'
    id: HUB.TriageA.gr__dispatch_cycles_active_queue_sync.avg.pct_of_peak_sustained_elapsed
    category: engine activity
    storageType: uint8
  - name: Async Compute In Flight
    description: Async Compute In Flight
    color: '#FFD179'
    id: HUB.TriageA.gr__dispatch_cycles_active_queue_async.avg.pct_of_peak_sustained_elapsed
    category: engine activity
    storageType: uint8
  - name: SM Active
    description: Total number of cycles the SM is active (at least 1 active warp).
    color: '#FFA5A5'
    id: sm__cycles_active.avg.pct_of_peak_sustained_elapsed
    category: cycles
    storageType: uint8
  - name: SM Issue
    description: SM instruction issue rate. Each SM can issue 4 instructions/cycle (1 instruction/SMSP/cycle).
    color: '#98C4DD'
    id: SM.TriageA.sm__inst_executed_realtime.avg.pct_of_peak_sustained_elapsed
    category: SM throughput
    storageType: uint8
  - name: Tensor Active / FP16 Active
    description: Cycles the tensor pipe or fp16x2 pipe is active.
    color: '#B3FF70'
    id: SM.TriageA.sm__pipe_shared_cycles_active_realtime.avg.pct_of_peak_sustained_elapsed
    category: SM throughput
    storageType: uint8
  - name: Vertex/Tess/Geometry Warps In Flight
    description: Total number of graphics vertex, tesselation, geometry, and mesh shader warps in flight.
    color: '#FFA5A5'
    id: TPC.TriageA.tpc__warps_active_shader_vtg_realtime.avg.pct_of_peak_sustained_elapsed
    category: warp occupancy
    storageType: uint8
  - name: Pixel Warps In Flight
    description: Total number of pixel shader warps in flight.
    color: '#8BDDB4'
    id: TPC.TriageA.tpc__warps_active_shader_ps_realtime.avg.pct_of_peak_sustained_elapsed
    category: warp occupancy
    storageType: uint8
  - name: Compute Warps In Flight
    description: Total number of compute shader warps in flight.
    color: '#FFD179'
    id: TPC.TriageA.tpc__warps_active_shader_cs_realtime.avg.pct_of_peak_sustained_elapsed
    category: warp occupancy
    storageType: uint8
  - name: Unallocated Warps in Active SMs
    description: Total number of warp slots available on active SMs.
    color: '#696969'
    id: TPC.TriageA.tpc__warps_inactive_sm_active_realtime.avg.pct_of_peak_sustained_elapsed
    category: warp occupancy
    storageType: uint8
  - name: DRAM Read Throughput
    description: DRAM Read Throughput
    color: '#FFA5A5'
    id: dramc__read_throughput.avg.pct_of_peak_sustained_elapsed
    category: unit throughput
    storageType: uint8
  - name: DRAM Write Throughput
    description: DRAM Write Throughput
    color: '#98C4DD'
    id: dramc__write_throughput.avg.pct_of_peak_sustained_elapsed
    category: unit throughput
    storageType: uint8
  - name: NVLink RX Requests Protocol Data
    description: Number of bytes of NVLRX request protocol data
    color: '#C79536'
    id: nvlrx__bytes_packet_request_data_protocol.avg.pct_of_peak_sustained_elapsed
    category: NVLink Bandwidth
    storageType: uint8
    rule: optional
  - name: NVLink RX Requests User Data
    description: Number of bytes of NVLRX request user data
    color: '#FFD179'
    id: nvlrx__bytes_packet_request_data_user.avg.pct_of_peak_sustained_elapsed
    category: NVLink Bandwidth
    storageType: uint8
    rule: optional
  - name: NVLink RX Responses Protocol Data
    description: Number of bytes of NVLRX response protocol data
    color: '#C25D5D'
    id: nvlrx__bytes_packet_response_data_protocol.avg.pct_of_peak_sustained_elapsed
    category: NVLink Bandwidth
    storageType: uint8
    rule: optional
  - name: NVLink RX Responses User Data
    description: Number of bytes of NVLRX response user data
    color: '#FFA5A5'
    id: nvlrx__bytes_packet_response_data_user.avg.pct_of_peak_sustained_elapsed
    category: NVLink Bandwidth
    storageType: uint8
    rule: optional
  - name: NVLink TX Requests Protocol Data
    description: Number of bytes of NVLTX request protocol data
    color: '#9052BF'
    id: nvltx__bytes_packet_request_data_protocol.avg.pct_of_peak_sustained_elapsed
    category: NVLink Bandwidth
    storageType: uint8
    rule: optional
  - name: NVLink TX Requests User Data
    description: Number of bytes of NVLTX request user data
    color: '#D6A4FC'
    id: nvltx__bytes_packet_request_data_user.avg.pct_of_peak_sustained_elapsed
    category: NVLink Bandwidth
    storageType: uint8
    rule: optional
  - name: NVLink TX Responses Protocol Data
    description: Number of bytes of NVLTX response protocol data
    color: '#6999B5'
    id: nvltx__bytes_packet_response_data_protocol.avg.pct_of_peak_sustained_elapsed
    category: NVLink Bandwidth
    storageType: uint8
    rule: optional
  - name: NVLink TX Responses User Data
    description: Number of bytes of NVLTX response user data
    color: '#98C4DD'
    id: nvltx__bytes_packet_response_data_user.avg.pct_of_peak_sustained_elapsed
    category: NVLink Bandwidth
    storageType: uint8
    rule: optional
  - name: PCIe RX Throughput
    description: Number of bytes received by GPU (includes protocol).
    color: '#FF3D00'
    id: PCI.TriageA.pcie__read_bytes.avg.pct_of_peak_sustained_elapsed
    category: PCI throughput
    storageType: uint8
    rule: migOptional
  - name: PCIe TX Throughput
    description: Number of bytes transmitted by GPU (includes protocol).
    color: '#00CFCF'
    id: PCI.TriageA.pcie__write_bytes.avg.pct_of_peak_sustained_elapsed
    category: PCI throughput
    storageType: uint8
    rule: migOptional
  - name: PCIe Read Requests to BAR1
    description: CPU+Peer Reads from VRAM over PCIe
    color: '#FF3D00'
    id: pcie__rx_requests_aperture_bar1_op_read.sum
    category: PCIe BAR1
    storageType: uint32
  - name: PCIe Write Requests to BAR1
    description: CPU+Peer Writes to VRAM over PCIe
    color: '#00CFCF'
    id: pcie__rx_requests_aperture_bar1_op_write.sum
    category: PCIe BAR1
    storageType: uint32

- name: Graphics Throughput Metrics for NVIDIA GA10x (frequency >= 10kHz)
  alias: ga10x-gfxt
  supportedChips: [GA102, GA103, GA104, GA106, GA107]
  counterWidth: narrow
  displayRows:
  - name: <Root>
    description: GPU Metrics
    displayHeightScale: 0.5
    metrics:
    - GPU Active
    - Async Copy Engine Active
    - Sync Copy Engine Active
    - GR Active
    type: overlay
  - name: <Root>
    displayHeightScale: -0.5
    metrics:
    - VRAM Read Bandwidth
    - VRAM Write Bandwidth
    - PCI Read Bandwidth
    - PCI Write Bandwidth
    type: overlay
  - name: GPU Active
    description: Activity of the graphics and copy engines
    metrics:
    - GPU Active
    - Sync Copy Engine Active
    - Async Copy Engine Active
    - GR Active
    type: overlay
  - name: Unit Throughputs
    description: Throughput of each major hardware unit
    displayHeightScale: 2.0
    metrics:
    - SM Throughput
    - VAF Throughput
    - L1 Throughput
    - L2 Throughput
    - VRAM Throughput
    - PCI Throughput
    - PD Throughput
    - PES+VPC Throughput
    - RASTER Throughput
    - PROP Throughput
    - ZROP Throughput
    - CROP Throughput
    type: overlay
  - name: Compute In Flight
    description: Compute dispatches sent to the GPU queues that have been issued, but not yet complete
    metrics:
    - Sync Compute In Flight
    - Async Compute In Flight
    type: overlay
  - name: Draw/Dispatch Start
    description: Draw and dispatch start times
    metrics:
    - Draw Started
    - Dispatch Started
    type: overlay
  - name: SM Occupancy (TPC View)
    description: SM Occupancy (TPC View)
    metrics:
    - Vertex/Tess/Geometry Warps
    - Pixel Warps
    - Compute Warps
    - Unallocated Warps in Active SMs
    type: stacked
  - name: Warps Eligible
    description: "Average # of warps eligible to issue an instruction each cycle"
    metrics:
    - Warps Eligible
    type: stacked
  - name: FE Stalls
    description: FE stalls waiting for commands to complete
    metrics:
    - FE Stalled Sync
    - FE Stalled Async
    type: overlay
  - name: FE Pipeline Stalling Commands
    description: FE commands that require parts of the pipeline to stall
    metrics:
    - Go Idle Sync
    - Subchannel Switch Sync
    - Go Idle Async
    - Subchannel Switch Async
    - Pixel Shader Barriers
    type: overlay
  - name: SM Register Usage (Occupancy Limiter)
    description: "Average # of registers allocated each cycle per SM"
    metrics:
    - 3D Register Allocation
    - CS Register Allocation
    type: stacked
  - name: SM Shared+ISBE Memory Usage (Occupancy Limiter)
    description: "Average # of shared and ISBE memory bytes allocated each cycle"
    metrics:
    - CS Shared Memory Allocated (Sync)
    - CS Shared Memory Allocated (Async)
    - VTG ISBE Memory Allocated
    type: stacked
  - name: SM TRAM Memory Usage (Occupancy Limiter)
    description: "Average # of TRAM memory bytes allocated each cycle"
    metrics:
    - PS TRAM Memory Allocated
    type: stacked
  - name: Active Thread Groups in SM
    description: "Average # of active threads per SM each cycle"
    metrics:
    - Active Thread Groups in SM
    type: stacked
  - name: SM Instruction Throughputs
    description: SM instruction throughput breakdown by pipe
    metrics:
    - SM Issue Active
    - SM ALU Pipe Throughput
    - SM FMA Light Pipe Throughput
    - SM FMA Heavy Pipe Throughput
    - SM SFU Pipe Throughput
    type: overlay
  - name: L1 Throughputs
    description: L1 cache throughputs breakdown by stage
    metrics:
    - L1 LSU Data-Stage Throughput
    - L1 Texture Data-Stage Throughput
    - L1 LSU Writeback-Stage Throughput
    - L1 Texture Writeback-Stage Throughput
    - L1 Texture Filter-Stage Throughput
    type: overlay
  - name: L1 LSU Throughputs
    description: L1 cache LSU throughputs breakdown by memory space
    metrics:
    - L1 Local+Global Data-Stage Throughput
    - L1 Shared+Attribute Data-Stage Throughput
    - L1 Surface Data-Stage Throughput
    type: overlay
  - name: L1 Hit Rate
    description: L1 cache hit rate for all operations
    metrics:
    - L1 Hit Rate
    type: overlay
  - name: TEX Stalled on Descriptor Cache Miss
    description: Cycles where the texture pipe input stage was stalled on a TSL1 miss, waiting for L1.5
    metrics:
    - TEX Stalled on Descriptor Cache Miss
    type: overlay
  - name: L2 Bandwidth (Source)
    description: L2 cache bandwidth breakdown by source unit
    metrics:
    - L2 Bandwidth from L1
    - L2 Bandwidth from GCC
    - L2 Bandwidth from PE
    - L2 Bandwidth from CROP
    - L2 Bandwidth from ZROP
    - L2 Bandwidth from Raster
    - L2 Bandwidth from FBP
    - L2 Bandwidth from HUB
    type: stacked
  - name: L2 Bandwidth (Destination)
    description: L2 cache bandwidth breakdown by destination unit
    metrics:
    - L2 Bandwidth to VRAM
    - L2 Bandwidth to PCI+Peer
    type: stacked
  - name: L2 Hit Rates
    description: L2 cache hit rates in aggregate and for read operations from L1
    metrics:
    - L2 Hit Rate
    - L2 Hit Rate from L1
    type: overlay
  - name: VRAM Bandwidth
    description: VRAM read/write bandwidth
    metrics:
    - VRAM Read Bandwidth
    - VRAM Write Bandwidth
    type: stacked
  - name: PCI Bandwidth
    description: PCI read/write bandwidth
    metrics:
    - PCI Read Bandwidth
    - PCI Write Bandwidth
    type: overlay
  - name: PCIe Read Requests to BAR1
    metrics:
    - PCIe Read Requests to BAR1
    type: overlay
  - name: PCIe Write Requests to BAR1
    metrics:
    - PCIe Write Requests to BAR1
    type: overlay

- name: Graphics Async Compute Triage Metrics for NVIDIA GA10x (frequency >= 10kHz)
  alias: ga10x-gfxact
  supportedChips: [GA102, GA103, GA104, GA106, GA107]
  counterWidth: narrow
  displayRows:
  - name: <Root>
    description: GPU Metrics
    displayHeightScale: 0.5
    metrics:
    - GPU Active
    - Async Copy Engine Active
    - Sync Copy Engine Active
    - GR Active
    type: overlay
  - name: <Root>
    displayHeightScale: -0.5
    metrics:
    - VRAM Read Bandwidth
    - VRAM Write Bandwidth
    - PCI Read Bandwidth
    - PCI Write Bandwidth
    type: overlay
  - name: GPU Active
    description: Activity of the graphics and copy engines
    metrics:
    - GPU Active
    - Sync Copy Engine Active
    - Async Copy Engine Active
    - GR Active
    type: overlay
  - name: Unit Throughputs
    description: Throughput of each major hardware unit
    displayHeightScale: 2.0
    metrics:
    - SM Throughput
    - VAF Throughput
    - L1 Throughput
    - L2 Throughput
    - VRAM Throughput
    - PCI Throughput
    - PD Throughput
    - PES+VPC Throughput
    - RASTER Throughput
    - PROP Throughput
    - ZROP Throughput
    - CROP Throughput
    type: overlay
  - name: Compute In Flight
    description: Compute dispatches sent to the GPU queues that have been issued, but not yet complete
    metrics:
    - Sync Compute In Flight
    - Async Compute In Flight
    type: overlay
  - name: Draw/Dispatch Start
    description: Draw and dispatch start times
    metrics:
    - Draw Started
    - Dispatch Started
    type: overlay
  - name: SM Occupancy (TPC View)
    description: SM Occupancy (TPC View)
    metrics:
    - Vertex/Tess/Geometry Warps
    - Pixel Warps
    - Compute Warps
    - Unallocated Warps in Active SMs
    type: stacked
  - name: FE Stalls
    description: FE stalls waiting for commands to complete
    metrics:
    - FE Stalled Sync
    - FE Stalled Async
    type: overlay
  - name: FE Pipeline Stalling Commands
    description: FE commands that require parts of the pipeline to stall
    metrics:
    - Go Idle Sync
    - Subchannel Switch Sync
    - Go Idle Async
    - Subchannel Switch Async
    - Pixel Shader Barriers
    type: overlay
  - name: SM Register Usage (Occupancy Limiter)
    description: "Average # of registers allocated each cycle per SM"
    metrics:
    - 3D Register Allocation
    - CS Register Allocation (Sync)
    - CS Register Allocation (Async)
    type: stacked
  - name: SM Shared Memory Usage (Occupancy Limiter)
    description: "Average # of shared memory bytes allocated each cycle"
    metrics:
    - Shared Memory Allocated (Sync)
    - Shared Memory Allocated (Async)
    type: stacked
  - name: Active Thread Groups in SM
    description: "Average # of active threads per SM each cycle"
    metrics:
    - Active Thread Groups in SM Total
    - Active Thread Groups in SM (sync)
    - Active Thread Groups in SM (async)
    type: stacked
  - name: SM Instruction Throughputs
    description: SM instruction throughput breakdown by pipe
    metrics:
    - SM Executed Instructions
    - SM ALU Pipe Throughput
    - SM FMA Light Pipe Throughput
    - SM FMA Heavy Pipe Throughput
    - SM SFU Pipe Throughput
    type: overlay
  - name: L1 Throughputs
    description: L1 cache throughputs breakdown by stage
    metrics:
    - L1 LSU Data-Stage Throughput
    - L1 Texture Data-Stage Throughput
    - L1 LSU Writeback-Stage Throughput
    - L1 Texture Writeback-Stage Throughput
    - L1 Texture Filter-Stage Throughput
    type: overlay
  - name: L1 LSU Throughputs
    description: L1 cache LSU throughputs breakdown by memory space
    metrics:
    - L1 Local+Global Data-Stage Throughput
    - L1 Shared+Attribute Data-Stage Throughput
    - L1 Surface Data-Stage Throughput
    type: overlay
  - name: L1 Hit Rate
    description: L1 cache hit rate for all operations
    metrics:
    - L1 Hit Rate
    type: overlay
  - name: TEX Stalled on Descriptor Cache Miss
    description: Cycles where the texture pipe input stage was stalled on a TSL1 miss, waiting for L1.5
    metrics:
    - TEX Stalled on Descriptor Cache Miss
    type: overlay
  - name: L2 Bandwidth (Source)
    description: L2 cache bandwidth breakdown by source unit
    metrics:
    - L2 Bandwidth from L1
    - L2 Bandwidth from GCC
    - L2 Bandwidth from PE
    - L2 Bandwidth from CROP
    - L2 Bandwidth from ZROP
    - L2 Bandwidth from Raster
    - L2 Bandwidth from FBP
    - L2 Bandwidth from HUB
    type: stacked
  - name: L2 Bandwidth (Destination)
    description: L2 cache bandwidth breakdown by destination unit
    metrics:
    - L2 Bandwidth to VRAM
    - L2 Bandwidth to PCI+Peer
    type: stacked
  - name: L2 Hit Rates
    description: L2 cache hit rates in aggregate and for read operations from L1
    metrics:
    - L2 Hit Rate
    - L2 Hit Rate from L1
    type: overlay
  - name: VRAM Bandwidth
    description: VRAM read/write bandwidth
    metrics:
    - VRAM Read Bandwidth
    - VRAM Write Bandwidth
    type: stacked
  - name: PCI Bandwidth
    description: PCI read/write bandwidth
    metrics:
    - PCI Read Bandwidth
    - PCI Write Bandwidth
    type: overlay
  - name: PCIe Read Requests to BAR1
    metrics:
    - PCIe Read Requests to BAR1
    type: overlay
  - name: PCIe Write Requests to BAR1
    metrics:
    - PCIe Write Requests to BAR1
    type: overlay
